001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
004
005import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.equalTo;
006import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.hasItem;
007import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
008import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
009
010public class GradesFromD2LImporterTest {
011
012  @Test
013  public void errorWhenD2LQuizDoesNotExistInGradebook() {
014    String studentId = "studentId";
015
016    GradeBook gradebook = new GradeBook("test");
017    Student student = new Student(studentId);
018    gradebook.addStudent(student);
019
020    GradesFromD2L d2l = new GradesFromD2L();
021    GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent d2LStudent = GradesFromD2L.newStudent().setFirstName("first").setLastName("last").setD2LId(studentId).create();
022    d2LStudent.setScore("quiz", 3.4);
023    d2l.addStudent(d2LStudent);
024
025    assertThrows(IllegalStateException.class, () ->
026      GradesFromD2LImporter.importGradesFromD2L(d2l, gradebook)
027    );
028  }
029
030  @Test
031  public void importScoreFromD2LWhenStudentIdMatchesD2LId() {
032    String studentId = "studentId";
033    String quizName = "quiz";
034    double score = 3.4;
035
036    GradeBook gradebook = new GradeBook("test");
037    gradebook.addAssignment(new Assignment(quizName, 4.0));
038    Student student = new Student(studentId);
039    gradebook.addStudent(student);
040
041    GradesFromD2L d2l = new GradesFromD2L();
042    GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent d2LStudent = GradesFromD2L.newStudent().setFirstName("first").setLastName("last").setD2LId(studentId).create();
043    d2LStudent.setScore(quizName, score);
044    d2l.addStudent(d2LStudent);
045
046    GradesFromD2LImporter.importGradesFromD2L(d2l, gradebook);
047
048    assertThat(student.getGradeNames(), hasItem(quizName));
049    assertThat(student.getGrade(quizName).getScore(), equalTo(score));
050  }
051
052  @Test
053  public void importScoreFromD2LWhenStudentNameMatchesD2LName() {
054    String firstName = "first";
055    String lastName = "last";
056
057    String quizName = "quiz";
058    double score = 3.4;
059
060    GradeBook gradebook = new GradeBook("test");
061    gradebook.addAssignment(new Assignment(quizName, 4.0));
062    Student student = new Student("studentId");
063    student.setFirstName(firstName);
064    student.setLastName(lastName);
065    gradebook.addStudent(student);
066
067    GradesFromD2L d2l = new GradesFromD2L();
068    GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent d2LStudent = GradesFromD2L.newStudent().setFirstName(firstName).setLastName(lastName).setD2LId("d2LstudentId").create();
069    d2LStudent.setScore(quizName, score);
070    d2l.addStudent(d2LStudent);
071
072    GradesFromD2LImporter.importGradesFromD2L(d2l, gradebook);
073
074    assertThat(student.getGradeNames(), hasItem(quizName));
075    assertThat(student.getGrade(quizName).getScore(), equalTo(score));
076  }
077
078
079
080}
